# Copilot Instructions â€“ Engineering Standards

## Stack

- Frontend: React + TypeScript
- Backend: Node.js
- Tests: Jest + Playwright

## Code style
    
- Prefer small, pure functions
- Use early returns
- Avoid magic numbers
- Name variables descriptively (no abbreviations)

## Architecture

- Business logic must be framework-agnostic
- No direct DB access in controllers

## Tests

- Every new feature must include tests
- Prefer integration tests over mocks
